{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3408942,"name":"","username":"RayLiu","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/r/edb3f5/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-07-17T03:38:08.833Z","cooked":"

Hi guys,

I am writing on behalf of a graduate student at my lab, Haoyu Xiong, to buy/rent Kraken X60 motors.

Haoyu is an AI researcher at Carnegie Mellon University primarily focusing on mobile manipulation for robots. Here is his website in case you are interested in his research. Haoyu currently needs 8 Kraken X60 motors for his work, but they are out of order. He would be delighted to buy at a higher price or rent (contact me for details) them from anyone.

Please reach out to me if you are interested.

Best,
Ray Liu
PS: You can also contact Haoyu through his email: haoyux.me@gmail.com.

It is worth noting that for non-FRC use, the Kraken X60’s MSRP is $299.99
https://wcproducts.com/products/kraken

Thanks for the advice! However I’m afraid Haoyu needs the motors sooner than what is promised on the website. He would need them within 2 weeks. While backordering is a good last resort, I would greatly appreciate anyone who is willing to sell/rent Krakens in this short time frame and prices are negotiable.
